definition[0]: to support something by leaning it against something, or by putting something else under, next to, or behind it
example[0]: Can we prop the window open with something?
example[1]: He propped his bike against a tree.
definition[1]: an object placed under or against something to hold it in a particular position
definition[2]: a small object such as a book, weapon etc, used by actors in a play or film
example[2]: Anna looks after costumes and props.
definition[3]: something or someone that helps you to feel strong
example[4]: She was becoming an emotional prop for him.
definition[5]: one of the players in a rugby team, who is large and strong and holds up the scrum
